channel.title: Avarrocka - Simple as that
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Dv0pFKF.png[/img][/center] [hr]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fC84Y0M.png[/img] Avarrocka is a server like no other server. It is made to entertain. Avarrocka will be a server with many features. It will be have perfectly made minigames, skills and bosses as well as a great combat system. This server is based on Apollo. This isn’t a rushed project, so keep that in mind. Our team is still working hard on getting each feature to perfection. We’ve set many goals to accomplish in our development. Please support us and prove some feedback about our progress once it will be showed. [hr]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2Sf7m6H.png[/img] Once upon a time, when nomadic tribes were scattered across Misthalin, there was one tribe that was ruled by a great warrior named Avar Rocka. Through his travels, he picked up many allies and grew his tribe bigger than any others on the continent. They decided to settle down and become the first, and biggest, city in Misthalin. With Avar Rocka as the leader, and the Council of Avarrocka behind him, they ruled and defended off any attack that came at them. As more cities settled, Avarrocka became the center city of the world, becoming the central hub for politics, economics, trade, and their first known news-paper.
It’s now the 4th name is Varrock, still keeping its’ roots. A monarch has been set up in the land of Varrock, with King Roland III acting as the current king. There has been major attacks on Varrock but nothing that the city couldn’t handle on its’ own. The city is an economic treasure and it’s clearly been defined as the capitol of the world. With that, trouble does lead. Even recently, a discovery at the Varrock Museum finds new notes from the original leader Avar Rocka. They found a note regarding his disappearance, stating he was heading to the “Land of the Creators” and that if he does not return the leader of the Council of Avarrocka would be acting head. More information has been discovered and people are scrambling for the “Land of the Creators”. It’s your job to find out where that is. [hr]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NXjbGbY.png[/img]
[ul][li]Mod Artem - Game Developer[/li] [li]Mod Rob - Game Developer[/li] [li]Mod Steve - Game Developer[/li] [li]Mod Ryley - Game Developer[/li] [li]Mod Cory - Website Developer[/li] [li]Mod Ruby - Website Developer[/li] [li]Mod Andrew - Content Writer[/li][/ul]
[hr]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/STQ5egz.png[/img]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VoZPaJefV1Y]Avarrocka - Skilling Orbs. - YouTube[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VsjbO9IfFqM]Avarrocka - Loading & Login. - YouTube[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cvxqwpQThnc]Avarrocka - Advanced GameFrame System. - YouTube[/url]
[center]True full screen fully working. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hlVV8nl.png[/img]
Re-sizable screen with closed tab and chat. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mXfNVRc.png[/img]
Re-sizable screen fully working. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5MYV4rm.png[/img]
474 Gameframe. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Aj6jxwM.png[/img]
Loading screen. (Rotating circle + load speed depends of your computer processor performance, mine loads at 2 seconds) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/y3yyB9f.png[/img]
LoginScreen, still in progress. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TFHxzqg.png[/img]
LoginScreen - Finished [img]http://i.imgur.com/KrQXRQ2.jpg[/img]
Task system - client sided fully done. [img]http://i.imgur.com/eVu85PZ.png[/img][/center]

[quote=“Avarrocka, post:16, topic:518738”]Well, still thank you to point out errors. I haven’t wrote this up. I’ll fix them ASASP.[/quote]yeah I am sorry if I am being a pain in the rear about the whole grammar stuff. However, when it comes to a topic that I actually take interest in it has to look right.

item.title: Avarrocka - Simple as that
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

It will be have perfectly made minigames

should be…

It will have perfectly made minigames

[hr]

It is made to entertain

That is a run on sentence you should clarify what “it” actually is.

[hr]

and prove some feedback about our progress once it will be showed.

That doesn’t …even make sense to me I’m sorry.

perhaps say something like…

Please support us by providing feedback about our progress as time goes along.

Or something like that…

[hr]

he picked up many allies and grew his tribe bigger than any others onthe continent.

should be…

he gained many allies and his tribe became larger than any other on the continent.

[hr]

still keeping its’ roots.

“its’” doesn’t look like right to me for some reason?

[hr]

with King Roland 3th

you mean 3rd

[hr]

There has been major attacks on Varrock but

should be…

There have been major attacks on Varrock, but

[hr]

Now! At the media…

the fullscreen (correct me if I am wrong…didn’t play much after fullscreen etc came out… ) I don’t believe the chat tabs at the bottom was so “spaced” I believe they were together if that makes sense.

besides that it looks good. I mostly just see client features at the moment which I guess is a good start. If you need any help on quest brainstorming just give me a holler

Read full topic

item.title: Avarrocka - Simple as that
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

amy_webb:

I’m with tehjamdude, don’t make everything an image, it is incredibly annoying. The history lesson was a bore, i could barely get through it. Maybe next time you could hire a writer rather then doing it yourself, the use of language was horrible. Other then that, good luck i guess. It has potential.

I did not wrote the story line, however, i’ll try to get some rework done. About the images, i’ll leave them, i will just probably write an text spoiler for people with low internet connectivity.

Sorry for my bad english grammar. It is not my first language.

Read full topic

item.title: Avarrocka - Simple as that
item.dc:creator: @tehjamdude tehjamdude
item.description:
@tehjamdude wrote:

Why would you make everything an image, it took me like a minute to load them?

We also have a nice little yourtube function in bb code, why would’t you use that instead of an image.

You should also add more media, with my poor eye site i had to change the zoom to 300% before I could see any details in your media.

But i do like the Logo text, looks pretty cool.

Good Luck, I guess…

Read full topic

item.title: Avarrocka - Simple as that
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Avarrocka is a server that no other

You mean to say

Avarrocka is a server like no other

[hr]

It is made to entertain

that is a run on sentence.

[hr]

See what I mean now? It seriously needs rewriting no offence.

Read full topic

item.title: Avarrocka - Simple as that
item.dc:creator: @Avarrocka Avarrocka
item.description:
@Avarrocka wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:518738”]Please work on your grammar…you have run on sentences, sentences that do no make any sense at all to me and etc. I was going to list them for you but there are just way too many

@the skilling system, correct me if I am wrong but aren’t you supposed to show fireworks still even with the orbs? (maybe it was too dark in video but didn’t see any)

Good luck I see you have ruby on the team.[/quote]

I do not see any bad grammar sentences. We couldn’t include any fireworks animations into the orbs.

Read full topic

item.title: Avarrocka - Simple as that
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Please work on your grammar…you have run on sentences, sentences that do no make any sense at all to me and etc. I was going to list them for you but there are just way too many

@the skilling system, correct me if I am wrong but aren’t you supposed to show fireworks still even with the orbs? (maybe it was too dark in video but didn’t see any)

Good luck I see you have ruby on the team.
